name: Neon Blade Impetus
description:
An AI gone rogue, your only goal is to escape the dark digital city. 

Cut your way through the system's defenses, slipping past projectiles and slicing through turrets in an intense momentum-based parkour game.

Downloadable builds recommended! (WebGL audio issues)

Pres [ESC] in game to change the mouse settings.

Neon Blade Impetus was developed over a four-week time period as a final project for ECS 189L Gameplay Programming in the Spring of 2022.
